pr_title: fix an issue where anonymous toplevel nodes were not created for record types.

timeline.body:
I think we can test the complete logic here when we set `isAnonymous` itself. This is to prevent setting the `isAnonymous`  again and again. Good call on creating a function. But it is better to move this logic inside to your function. 
Check here also.
